import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const Dialog = (props) => { const setDialogOpen = props.setDialogOpen; const dialogRef = props.dialogRef; const [isUseTermsDisplayed, setUseTermsDisplay] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { if (isUseTermsDisplayed) { document.getElementById('dialogChevron').style.transform = "rotate(180deg)" } else { document.getElementById('dialogChevron').style.transform = "rotate(0deg)" } }, [isUseTermsDisplayed]) return (
